title: Title:
titleMustStartWithACapitalLetterAndEngli: Title must start with a capital letter and English words.
titleMustStartWithAnArabicLetter: Title must start with an Arabic letter.
descriptionCanOnlyContainEnglishLettersA: Description can only contain English letters and spaces.
descriptionCanOnlyContainArabicLettersAn: Description can only contain Arabic letters and spaces.
